cause.description:
We shall create a world of social order, progress, and imperial tranquility!!
Who dares to stand against OUR will!?!?
1. All nations must submit themselves the sovereign authority of His Imperial Majesty
2. All people's must submit themselves the sovereign authority of His Imperial Majesty
3. All things must submit themselves the sovereign authority of His Imperial Majesty
cause.mission: Make Bryan the EMPEROR of the WORLD!
cause.name: Bryan I, DG Imperator Mundi
